metadata.title: Asteroid Impact Simulation - Interactive NEO Impact Modeling
metadata.description: Experience realistic asteroid impact simulations using NASA and USGS datasets. Model impact scenarios, predict consequences, and evaluate mitigation strategies for planetary defense.
metadata.keywords: asteroid simulation, impact simulation, NEO modeling, planetary defense simulation, asteroid impact modeling, space simulation, disaster prevention simulation, NASA simulation
